name: Demeter Last Voyage
description:
The Demeter has been sent to foreing planets with the intention of stopping the terrible space pirates from wreaking havoc.

Battle against a horde of alien creatures and defeat the nefarious space pirates in this action packed bullet hell game!

Use the power to stop time so you can defeat terrible enemies and emerge victorius!

With three diferent planets to explore and the capacity to use a wide arrange of tools, there will be no one that can stop you in fulfilling your duty.

Mechanics:

Movement: W/A/S/D.

Shooting Missiles: Space Bar.

Stop Time: F.

Pause Game: P.
